name: Konstantin Stark
aboutMeText: Hi, I'm a creative developer from the Bayreuth area. Programming is not just a technical task – it's a creative process. With a head full of ideas and a tendency to sometimes take unconventional paths, I find solutions that others might overlook. My goal is to develop solutions through creative approaches that are both practical and innovative.
location: In the Kulmbach and Bayreuth districts, I am flexible, but I am most effective remotely, as I can shape my work style and environment ideally there.
personality: Open-minded, enthusiastic, and creative – the personality type 'ENFP' describes me well.
challenge: Open to new challenges and constantly looking for ways to expand my knowledge and skills.
projectDescription: Explore a selection of my work – interact with projects to see my skills in action.

elPolloLoco.description: Jump, run, and throw game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe collect coins and Tabasco sauce to fight the crazy chicken.

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks with drag-and-drop functionality, assign users and categories.

pokedex.description: Based on the PokéAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogs Pokémon information.
